about.title: DJ Sashko
about.description:
Another multi-purpose Discord bot with music, moderation, fun, and more!
[Click here]({0}) to invite me to your server!

anime._description: Search for an anime on Kitsu.io

filter.3d: Audio spins around the listener in a circle

_args_desc.filter: The filter to apply (`off` to disable all filters)

filter._description: Apply a filter to the current queue
filter.bassboost: Boosts the bass of the audio
filter.echo: Adds an echo effect to the audio
filter.invalid_filter:
❌ Invalid filter!
Run `filter` command without arguments to see a list of available filters.
filter.karaoke: Removes the vocals from the audio
filter.phaser: Creates series of peaks and troughs in the audio
filter.title: 🔊 Filters
filter.vaporwave: Slow down the audio and adds an echo effect

_args_desc.mode: The repeat mode to use. Valid modes are: `off`, `song`, `queue`
